mapper.insert: insert into user2(user_num, user_id, user_password, user_nick, user_email, user_jobgroup, user_workspace, enabled, authority) values ('user'||TO_CHAR(USER_NUMseq.nextval, 00000), #{user_id},#{user_password},#{user_nick},#{user_email},#{user_jobgroup},#{user_workspace}, 1, 'ROLE_USER')
mapper.select: select user_id as username, user_password as password, enabled, authority from user2 where user_id=#{user_id}
